title: Deep Learning-Based Approach for Software Design Pattern Detection

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational object-oriented programming, basic software engineering concepts, and introductory machine learning knowledge
context.additional_context: A blended learning model conducted in digitally supported environments, combining theoretical learning with practical code analysis projects.

learning_goals: Learners can describe the main types of software design patterns and their application cases.
Learners can implement methods to identify design patterns using deep learning-based automatic feature extraction technology.
Learners can construct graph representation models from source code or system design documents and evaluate pattern detection accuracy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
